description: ML Kit Text Recognition fails to initialize, preventing indicator extraction from charts. Critical for QuantraVision intelligence.
commonCauses: ML Kit model not downloaded yet
Google Play Services outdated or missing
Incompatible ML Kit version with device
solutions: Check model availability before first use
Use bundled model variant if available
prevention: Bundle ML Kit model with app for offline use
Check model download on app startup
Test on devices with limited storage
Monitor ML Kit initialization success rate
Provide user feedback during model download
